Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Test injection of a Hibernate ORM Session

timeline.bodyText: ok that's interesting. Didn't expect to be able to combine PersistenceUnit on Session, but it's nice.
timeline.author: Sanne

replies.bodyText: This is Quarkus' own PersistenceUnit annotation, io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.PersistenceUnit. With the standard annotations you have to use @PersistenceContext; see MultiplePersistenceUnitsResourceInjectionSessionTest or SinglePersistenceUnitResourceInjectionSessionTest.
replies.author: yrodiere
